title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-host LLMs (Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma…) with a single CLI or REST endpoint; ships macOS/Linux binaries and Docker images.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official TypeScript/JavaScript client library for Ollama; works in Node & browsers, supports streaming, embeddings, pull/push.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; sync & async APIs, chat, generate, embeddings, tool-calling, model management.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package; drop-in LLM, chat and embeddings components powered by any Ollama model.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model manager, RAG, multi-user, dark/light themes); runs in Docker.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; fluent API, streaming, embeddings, model ops, Spring Boot starters available.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama; simple interface for chat, generate, pull, delete and embeddings.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-built interactive CLI wrapper with history, syntax highlighting and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot-like inline code assistant.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes: RAG with Chroma, function-calling, LangGraph agents, fine-tune adapters, Docker Compose stacks.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling and PVC support.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Ready-to-run Docker Compose stacks including Ollama, Open WebUI, Postgres, Qdrant and nginx reverse proxy.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Unofficial async Rust client; strongly-typed, tokio-based, supports chat, generate, pull, embeddings.

title: ollama-go
summary: Official Go client library; idiomatic API, streaming, embeddings, model management, MIT licensed.

title: ollama-node
summary: Zero-dependency Node.js client (npm) with TypeScript definitions, async iterators for streaming responses.

title: ollama-chat-electron
summary: Cross-platform desktop chat app built with Electron; markdown, code highlighting, local storage, auto-updater.

title: ollama-django
summary: Django package adding Ollama LLM backend to Django admin and generic views; includes chat widget template tags.

title: ollama-fastapi
summary: FastAPI service template exposing Ollama endpoints with JWT auth, rate-limiting, OpenAPI docs, and Docker.

title: ollama-rag-langchain
summary: Minimal RAG starter: ingest PDFs → Chroma → Ollama embeddings & chat; 100% local, runs in Jupyter notebook.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-host Discord bot bringing any Ollama model to servers with slash commands, context windows and per-guild configs.
